name: adjust_settings
description: Adjust the settings of the connected home energy device.

setting.description: The setting to adjust, such as 'energy_saving_mode'.

value.description: The value to set, such as 'true' or 'false'.

name: configure_settings
description: Configure the settings of electricity management systems.

system_url.description: The URL of the electricity management system.

settings_mode.description: The mode to set the system to. Example modes include 'HighDiversionMode'.

name: list_modules
description: List all available modules in the Bioelectricity Harvester.

name: disable_module
description: Disables the specified module to cease its operation.

module_id.description: The ID of the module to disable.
